pageContext.description:
The Church of St. Michael and All Angels with its detached belfry, one of seven in the county, at the end of Church Lane.

Original watercolour, image size 13" x 9.5".

(Original Watercolour SOLD)

A signed, embossed limited edition print is available £45.
